sentences.sContent: Mark’s always behind the rest of his class in mathematics.
sentences.sCn: 马克的数学成绩总是落在班上其他同学后面。

sentences.sContent: This victory lifts Ferguson’s team into fifth place, nine points behind leaders Norwich.
sentences.sCn: 这场胜利使弗格森的球队升到了第五名，落后领先的诺里奇队九分。

sentences.sContent: Europe was falling behind in the important field of computer technology.
sentences.sCn: 欧洲在计算机技术这一重要领域落后了。

sentences.sContent: Rising into the hills behind are 800 acres of parkland.
sentences.sCn: 往上延伸至后面小山的是800英亩的草木区。

trans.tranOther: not as successful or not having made as much progress as someone or something else
the part of your body that you sit on
